name: Smartphone X1
description: The Smartphone X1 is a powerful and sleek device that offers a seamless user experience. It features a high-resolution display, a fast processor, and a premium camera for capturing stunning photos and videos. Stay connected and productive on the go with the Smartphone X1.

name: Gaming Desk
description: Upgrade your gaming setup with the Gaming Desk. This spacious desk provides ample room for your gaming monitor, keyboard, mouse, and other accessories. It features a sturdy construction and ergonomic design to enhance your gaming experience.

name: Laptop Pro
description: The Laptop Pro is a high-performance laptop designed for professionals. It offers blazing-fast processing power, a brilliant display, and long battery life. Whether you're working on intensive tasks or enjoying multimedia content, the Laptop Pro delivers exceptional performance.
